document.full_text: warren buffett and the rest of berkshire hathaway inc's board of directors were sued by a shareholder on tuesday over presumed heir apparent david sokol's trading in the stock of a company that was later bought by berkshire.
document.title: berkshire, buffett sued over sokol's trades
lines_and_colors: warren buffett and the rest of berkshire hathaway inc's board of directors were sued by a shareholder on tuesday over presumed heir apparent david sokol's trading in the stock of a company that was later bought by berkshire.
